title: Restore missing favicon assets and ensure index.html references resolve

requirements.summary: Add the missing generated favicon PNGs under frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the exact filenames referenced by frontend/index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and are readable in the built app at the corresponding URLs: `/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`.
Each generated PNG is a crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background at its target size (no white circular background).

file_operations.description: Add a 16x16 PNG: crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background (no white circular background). Must be readable at runtime via /assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png.
Add a 32x32 PNG: crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background (no white circular background). Must be readable at runtime via /assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png.

Add a 180x180 PNG: crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background (no white circular background). Must be readable at runtime via /assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png.

Add a 192x192 PNG: crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background (no white circular background). Must be readable at runtime via /assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png.

Add a 512x512 PNG: crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background (no white circular background). Must be readable at runtime via /assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png.

requirements.summary: Ensure frontend/index.html favicon link tags match the actual generated asset filenames and paths under /assets/generated/.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` contains favicon `<link>` tags whose `href` paths resolve to existing files in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` after build.
After deployment, the favicon appears in the browser tab (after a normal refresh; if browser cache persists, it appears after a hard refresh).

file_operations.description: Verify the existing favicon <link> tags resolve to the created files under /assets/generated/ (favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png). Update href values only if any reference does not exactly match the on-disk filenames/paths after build.
